item.title: TRANSFORMING in NPC or OBJECT code help needed!
item.dc:creator: @skater_chick skater chick
item.description:
@skater_chick wrote:

umm im not sure if it works on testscape but on pimpscape you can do it by a command. i use ::pnpc (npc id). so you want to change into a genie right? so it would be ---->
::pnpc 409 , ::pnpc 3022 , ::pnpc 3351. i used 3 becuz there is 3 ID’S for the genie. at least one of them will work. hope this helps.

~Skater Chick~

Read full topic

item.title: TRANSFORMING in NPC or OBJECT code help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Ellesius Ellesius
item.description:
@Ellesius wrote:

hello guys i found some codes that can make you some objects or npc…etc i run TESTSCAPE by the way

thsi is one of them

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cart”)){
sendMessage(“You now look wierd…”);

pHead=82;
pTorso=82;
pArms=82;
pHands=82;
pLegs=82;
pFeet=82;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

so i was wondering where do i find these
pHead=82;
pTorso=82;
pArms=82;
pHands=82;
::::I MEAN HOW DO I KNOW WICH NPC OR OBJECT PART IT PRESENTS::::
and what object OR npc they present? Becouse i tryed objects id and items and npcs it doesn’t belong to any of that so where can i find those?

And if can’t and someone knows can someone give me this code that transforms you in GENIE. PLS help with this

And guys if u help me with this one i have a lots of ideas to put it in to the gameplay and make OUR servs a lot better.

I’ll post on answer:)

Read full topic
